name: Princesses vs Dragons: Royal Rumble
detailed_description:
Insert Dragon Here are launching the battle of the ages with their new game Princesses Vs Dragons and invite you to come pick a side for this very important cause.

Prepare for the battle of the century as the ancient feud between princesses, fairies, and dragons waging war from the skies across in 90s couch-surfing, screen-cheating nostalgia with a magical variety of adorable dragons, charming princesses and 5 levels of mayhem with more to come.

To prepare for our release in Q1 next year, we're releasing four early access game modes, along with a free play mode with relaxed rules for the younger sprites.

If you follow us on our Early Access journey, you'll receive new game modes, a variety of princesses and dragons, power-ups, and AI players to join you when you're training to be the best on the map.

Early Access Features

One to Four player split-screen competitive gameplay for controllers
A free-for-all scenario with up to 3 AI players
Fairy Hunt: A resource collection scenario with up to 3 AI players
Two Dragons with three skins each
Two Princesses with three skins each
Five Gorgeous Maps:
Royal Gardens
Sky Castle
Bamboo Forest
Crystal Caverns
Lava

Guaranteed New Features for General Release

More Princesses and Dragons!
More Maps!
A suite of new scenarios including teams, cops-and-robbers and elimination.
Fairy Queens (power-ups)
Achievements and Unlockable customization items.

short_description: Bring family and friends together in the delightful couch battles of Princesses vs Dragons. Get ready for retro-90s screen-cheating mayhem as youthful princesses and tiny dragons playout their eternal conflict in a cute fantasy world for all players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 (Haswell, 4th Gen) @ 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R7 240, NVIDIA GTX 680, or similar SM5 capable GPU.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 (Haswell, 4th Gen) @ 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 380, NVIDIA GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
